trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> eventos, bem como relacionados anexado e Visualizar eventos.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado é usado com os seguintes eventos anexados:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>Este delegado também é usado com os seguintes eventos roteados em elementos de base.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos roteados encaminham os eventos anexados listados anteriormente para torná-las mais acessível para o modelo de elemento geral em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>Os eventos anexados e os eventos roteado de elemento base compartilham seus dados de evento e bolha e túnel versões dos eventos roteados também compartilham dados de evento.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode afetar as características manipuladas do evento conforme ela se desloca a rota de evento.
Para obter detalhes, consulte [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
